jokes.content: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!
What fields are engineers found in? Everything except engineering!
Why do Java developers wear glasses? Because they can't C#!
How many programmers does it take to screw in a light bulb? None, that's a hardware problem.
Debugging: Being the detective in a crime movie where you are also the murderer.
Why do programmers hate nature? It has too many bugs.

Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it. - Charles R. Swindoll
